entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain or snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 40%
